attributes.title: False news

attributes.review: I got the app and saw a big orange tangerine on my screen. I’m horrified on what I just saw. I like the chips and this big human size Cheeto is disrespecting the name! I want to pour bleach on my eyes after what I just saw. I’d rather look directly into the sun than to relive what I just saw. Plus tacos are much better than this burnt Cheeto man! I’m gonna head on over with my FACE MASK to get some CARNÉ ASADA TACOS to wash down my vomit 🤢🤮.
attributes.title: Hell No

attributes.review: I downloaded this app to learn about the wonderful things the POTUS has done for this country. Instead a virus was automatically set to my phone, I am unable to do anything on my phone. DO NOT download this app! I was also unable to find any information on the positive things he has done in office. This app is a waste of your time.
attributes.title: Awful App

attributes.review: I just opened the Trump app because I was considering voting for him in the 2020 elections. I'm a God loving Christian... and I was appalled at the content of this app! Never in my life would I believe that our president Donald Trump would PUBLICLY post PORNOGRAPHIC PHOTOS of himself on the internet!! I cannot believe this unholy and unrighteous world we live in!!! Before today I only trusted three people, God, Jesus, and Trump. I'm so disappointed and disgusted.
attributes.title: PORNOGRAPHY!!

attributes.review: As soon as I downloaded this app and opened it a bunch of porn popped up of naked trump stripping on a pole and many more sexual acts, and my kids were right by me so they had to see it too!! I do NOT appreciate this kind of inappropriate things on an app that was supposed to be nothing of the sort!!! I will NEVER download this app again and neither should you😡🤬
